description: Currently, when you detach a volume from an instance, the volume stays in the "in-use" state until it gets detached, at which point it becomes "available".  It would be useful to have it in a "detaching" state.
title: Nova volume should have a detaching state similar to attaching state

comments.content: Currently, when you detach a volume from an instance, the volume stays in the "in-use" state until it gets detached, at which point it becomes "available".  It would be useful to have it in a "detaching" state.
